api_definition.name: WindowsCalc
api_definition.description: Uses the Windows Calculator to add two numbers
api_definition.prompt:
We want to compute the sum of two numbers using the Windows calculator. Here are the steps to do so:
- On screen you'll see the calculator. Ensure this window has focus, as we'll send keyboard events to it.
- Now type via the keyboard the number {{value_1}} and press send '+' via keyboard.
- Now type via the keyboard the number {{value_2}} and press send '=' via keyboard.
- The result will be displayed on the screen. This is what you shall return
api_definition.prompt_cleanup: Click on the button labeled 'C' to clear the result. There should be a 0 shown in the result field.
